title: Nee Summer!
synopsis: Yuuta Yamauchi is an average high school student preparing for exams through his summer vacation. His older cousin Kei Higashide, who takes pity on him as her "little brother," devotes her time and patience to tutor this relative in need.
staff: [['Sueda, Yoshifumi', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Sumeragi, Kohaku', ['Original Character Design']], ['Artemis.', ['Original Creator']]]
